class_notes: DABSN Semester 2, Session One: May 17 - June 23, 2021.
course_description: Students will examine the science of gerontological nursing, current issues facing older adults, common acute and chronic health issues in older adults, and the socioeconomic impact of aging. Concepts of palliative care and emotional health related to transitions and losses will be explored
sections: Class Nbr: 1806, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Coombe/Haynes Ferere, Status: Open
